text.div:
Narratif généré : EnsembleValeurs TLSVCategory

  • Include ce(s) code(s) tel quil(s) est (sont) défini(s) dans http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/observation-category version 📦2.0.0
    CodeAffichageDéfinition
    surveySurveyObservations from survey instruments (e.g., patient experience surveys), questionnaires, forms (e.g., patient admission forms) and assessment tools (e.g., Apgar Scores, Montreal Cognitive Assessment [MoCA]).
    vital-signsVital SignsClinical observations measure the body's basic functions such as blood pressure, heart rate, respiratory rate, height, weight, body mass index, head circumference, pulse oximetry, temperature, and body surface area.
    activityActivityObservations that measure or record any bodily activity that enhances or maintains physical fitness and overall health and wellness.

name: TLSVCategory
title: TLSV Categories
description: Liste des codes autorisés dans category dans le cadre du profil TLSVObservation
